          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">To…(I want to do) and -ing (I enjoy doing…)</string>
            <string language="en">To ... (I want to do) and-ing (I enjoy doing ...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">... (ich möchte tun) und-ing (ich genieße 
zu tun...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">... (je veux faire) et-ing (j'ai plaisir à 
faire...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">... (eu quero fazer) e-ing (eu aprecío 
fazer...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">... (desidero fare) e-ing (godo fare...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">... (θέλω να κάνω) και -και-ηνγ (απολαμβάνω...)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">... (deseo hacer) y-ing (gozo el hacer...)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Practise the use of “to” (I want to do) and “-ing” (I enjoy doing).Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Practice the use of "to" (I want to do) and "-ing" (I enjoy doing). Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Üben Sie den Gebrauch "" (ich möchte tun) und "-
ing" (ich genieße zu tun). Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratiquez l'utilisation de "" (je veux faire) et 
"- ing" (j'ai plaisir à faire). Safir - l'anglais et vie active
pour des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pratique o uso de "" (eu quero fazer) e "- ing" 
(eu aprecío fazer). Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento 
para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi nell'uso di "" (desidero fare) e "- 
ing" (godo fare). Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική η χρήση "" (θέλω να κάνω) και "- ing" 
(απολαμβάνω). Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή
για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Practique el uso de "" (deseo hacer) y "- ing" 
(gozo el hacer). ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
